name: miry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
consisting of deep, wet, sticky earth that is difficult to move through: The meadows between the village and the churchyard were wet and miry. The road was so miry that the horse had hard work to get through. See
mire
More examplesFewer examplesHeavy, miry ground greatly delayed our progress.When you got away from the huts, there was a road and beyond that a miry waste of paddy fields. The roads were miry and troublesome in winter.
